name: The big escapade
description:
A game made in powerpoint, for the powerpoint game jam march edition.

It has five levels... that's basically nothing. Which means: It is the perfect game for you to play, if you are busy, procastinating or just don't like playing games for a very long time!

There are two files that you can download: .ppsx and .pptx.

The ppsx file is just the presentation! You just have to open it, and it will feel like a game made in a proper engine! (you can close the game anytime by pressing the escape key)

The .pptx is the raw powerpoint file, in wich you can edit and take a look behind the scenes on how this thing was done (It isn't very organized, I know)

Also, rate the game.

Confused on how to play the game?
Got bugs to report?

send a tweet to me @kuerbiskosar, or @ me on the powerpoint game jam discord!
